lead_paragraph: The government of President Yoweri Museveni suspects the officers of having links to the opposition leader, Kizza Besigye, while critics of the charges see them as an attempt at intimidation.

headline.main: Uganda Arrests Dozens of Military Leaders Accused of Plotting Coup

snippet: The government of President Yoweri Museveni suspects the officers of having links to the opposition leader, Kizza Besigye, while critics of the charges see them as an attempt at intimidation.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
